name: BUGFIX: Fixes v1.11.2 Leopard GF8 GFNI code
body:
## What's Changed
* Leopard GF8: Write directly to output by @klauspost in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/226
* Disable broken Leopard GF8 GFNI code by @klauspost in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/229


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/compare/v1.11.2...v1.11.3

name: v1.11.2
body:
## What's Changed
* Add Leopard GF8 AVX512 by @klauspost in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/222
* Add AVX2 xor by @klauspost in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/223
* Add AVX512 GFNI processing by @klauspost in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/224
* Leopard GF8 GFNI by @klauspost in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/225

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/compare/v1.11.1...v1.11.2

name: v1.11.1
body:
## What's Changed

* Implement 8-bit leopard variant by @elias-orijtech in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/209
* Fix incorrect leopardFF16.TotalShards by @elias-orijtech in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/210
* Use assembly for fftDIT28 mulAdd by @klauspost in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/214
* Add 8 bit errorfield by @klauspost in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/213
* Add ARM64+PPC64LE leopard 8 assembly. by @klauspost in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/212
* Add fftDIT and ifftDIT assembly by @klauspost in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/218
* Add inversion cache for leopard GF8 by @klauspost in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/219
* Split leopard gf8 input by @klauspost in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/221


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/compare/v1.11.0...v1.11.1

name: v1.11.0
body:
## What's Changed

* Add an efficient implementation of shard counts up to 65536 by @elias-orijtech in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/191
* Implement jerasure algorithm of matrix generation for interoperability by @vitalif in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/200
* Add GF16 AVX2, AVX512 and SSSE3 by @klauspost in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/193
* Add GF16 Split/Join by @klauspost in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/194
* Add Leopard bitfield by @klauspost in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/208
* Improve fwht speed by @klauspost in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/198
* Decode benchmark by @elias-orijtech in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/197
* Unroll ifftDIT4/fftDIT4 branches. by @klauspost in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/204
* Simplify function selection by @klauspost in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/206
* Update interfaces & tests by @klauspost in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/203
* Upgrade Go CICD by @klauspost in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/201

## New Contributors
* @elias-orijtech made their first contribution in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/191

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/compare/v1.10.0...v1.11.0

name: v1.10.0
body:
## What's Changed

* Publish withSSE/withAVX options by @vitalif in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/186
* Add custom coding matrix support by @vitalif in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/187
* Implement ReconstructSome() to reconstruct only specific data shards by @vitalif in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/189
* Use VPTERNLOGD on GOAMD64=v4 in AVX2 by @klauspost in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/182
* Upgrade cpuid to avoid long startup time on Xen guests by @klauspost in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/190

## New Contributors
* @vitalif made their first contribution in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/186

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/compare/v1.9.16...v1.10.0

name: v1.9.16

* avx2: Improve speed when > 10 input or output shards. by @klauspost in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/174

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/compare/v1.9.15...v1.9.16

name: v1.9.15

* fix: avoid the padding of last data shard is not zero by @jiangfucheng in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/173
* Unroll pure go xor loop by @klauspost in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/172

## New Contributors

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/compare/v1.9.14...v1.9.15

name: v1.9.14
body:
## What's Changed
* Add progressive erasure shard encoding by @klauspost in https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/pull/170


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/klauspost/reedsolomon/compare/v1.9.13...v1.9.14

name: v1.9.10
body:
Update cpuid package (#154)
Faster AVX2 encoding (#153)

name: v1.9.7
body:
* Reduce stream allocations.
* Add fast multiply by row 1 without lookups.
* AVX2: Add 64 bytes per loop processing.
* Add AVX512 8 data -> 1 parity.

name: v1.9.6
body: Fix compilation issue on ARM64 and PPC64LE.

name: v1.9.5
body:
* Made non-assembly up to 40% faster.
* AVX512 can use multiple goroutines for lower latency + higher individual throughput.
* AVX512 5-9% faster.
* All code faster with user defined goroutines and high concurrency. Up to 8x faster due to less cache evictions.
* CPUID detects AMD CPUs with hyperthreading/multiple threads/core.
* CPUID detects AMD per CCX L3 cache size.
* Use L1 cache size to set minimum split size.
* Tests/benchmarks can disable specific assembly types.

name: v1.5
body:
* Add NEON support for ARM64 (#62)
* Add ReconstructData interface method (#57)
* add Update parity function (#60)
* fix unnecessary memory alloc in Split (#59)
* Minor cleanup (#61)
